verses.kjv: And the LORD spake unto Moses and unto Aaron, saying,
verses.web: LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to Moses and Aaron:

verses.kjv: Every man of the children of Israel shall pitch by his own standard, with the ensign of their father’s house: far off about the tabernacle of the congregation shall they pitch.
verses.web: “The children of Israel shall encamp every man by his own standard, with the banners of their fathers’ houses. They shall encamp around the Tent of Meeting at a distance from it.”
verses.ct: "Each Israelite is to set up camp under his own tribal banner, beneath the flag of his father's household. They are to camp around the Tent of Meeting, but at a distance from it."

verses.kjv: And on the east side toward the rising of the sun shall they of the standard of the camp of Judah pitch throughout their armies: and Nahshon the son of Amminadab shall be captain of the children of Judah.
verses.web: Those who encamp on the east side toward the sunrise shall be of the standard of the camp of Judah, according to their divisions. The prince of the children of Judah shall be Nahshon the son of Amminadab.
verses.ct: On the east side, facing the sunrise, the divisions under the banner of Judah's camp were to take their position. Nahshon son of Amminadab was the leader of Judah's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were threescore and fourteen thousand and six hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of them, were seventy-four thousand six hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 74,600 men.

verses.kjv: And those that do pitch next unto him shall be the tribe of Issachar: and Nethaneel the son of Zuar shall be captain of the children of Issachar.
verses.web: Those who encamp next to him shall be the tribe of Issachar. The prince of the children of Issachar shall be Nethanel the son of Zuar.
verses.ct: The tribe of Issachar was to camp next to Judah. Nethanel son of Zuar was the leader of Issachar's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and four thousand and four hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of it, were fifty-four thousand four hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 54,400 men.

verses.kjv: Then the tribe of Zebulun: and Eliab the son of Helon shall be captain of the children of Zebulun.
verses.web: The tribe of Zebulun: the prince of the children of Zebulun shall be Eliab the son of Helon.
verses.ct: Then came the tribe of Zebulun. Eliab son of Helon was the leader of Zebulun's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were fifty and seven thousand and four hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of it, were fifty-seven thousand four hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 57,400 men.

verses.kjv: All that were numbered in the camp of Judah were an hundred thousand and fourscore thousand and six thousand and four hundred, throughout their armies. These shall first set forth.
verses.web: All who were counted of the camp of Judah were one hundred eighty-six thousand four hundred, according to their divisions. They shall set out first.
verses.ct: The total count for Judah's camp was 186,400 men across all their divisions. They were to march out first.

verses.kjv: On the south side shall be the standard of the camp of Reuben according to their armies: and the captain of the children of Reuben shall be Elizur the son of Shedeur.
verses.web: “On the south side shall be the standard of the camp of Reuben according to their divisions. The prince of the children of Reuben shall be Elizur the son of Shedeur.
verses.ct: On the south side, the divisions under the banner of Reuben's camp were to take their position. Elizur son of Shedeur was the leader of Reuben's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered thereof, were forty and six thousand and five hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of it, were forty-six thousand five hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 46,500 men.

verses.kjv: And those which pitch by him shall be the tribe of Simeon: and the captain of the children of Simeon shall be Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
verses.web: “Those who encamp next to him shall be the tribe of Simeon. The prince of the children of Simeon shall be Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
verses.ct: The tribe of Simeon was to camp next to Reuben. Shelumiel son of Zurishaddai was the leader of Simeon's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were fifty and nine thousand and three hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of them, were fifty-nine thousand three hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 59,300 men.

verses.kjv: Then the tribe of Gad: and the captain of the sons of Gad shall be Eliasaph the son of Reuel.
verses.web: “The tribe of Gad: the prince of the children of Gad shall be Eliasaph the son of Reuel.
verses.ct: Then came the tribe of Gad. Eliasaph son of Reuel was the leader of Gad's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were forty and five thousand and six hundred and fifty.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of them, were forty-five thousand six hundred fifty.
verses.ct: His division numbered 45,650 men.

verses.kjv: All that were numbered in the camp of Reuben were an hundred thousand and fifty and one thousand and four hundred and fifty, throughout their armies. And they shall set forth in the second rank.
verses.web: “All who were counted of the camp of Reuben were one hundred fifty-one thousand four hundred fifty, according to their armies. They shall set out second.
verses.ct: The total count for Reuben's camp was 151,450 men across all their divisions. They were to march out second.

verses.kjv: Then the tabernacle of the congregation shall set forward with the camp of the Levites in the midst of the camp: as they encamp, so shall they set forward, every man in his place by their standards.
verses.web: “Then the Tent of Meeting shall set out, with the camp of the Levites in the middle of the camps. As they encamp, so shall they set out, every man in his place, by their standards.
verses.ct: After that, the Tent of Meeting was to move out, with the Levites' camp in the middle of the formation. Each group was to march in the same order they camped — every man in his assigned place under his own banner.

verses.kjv: On the west side shall be the standard of the camp of Ephraim according to their armies: and the captain of the sons of Ephraim shall be Elishama the son of Ammihud.
verses.web: “On the west side shall be the standard of the camp of Ephraim according to their divisions. The prince of the children of Ephraim shall be Elishama the son of Ammihud.
verses.ct: On the west side, the divisions under the banner of Ephraim's camp were to take their position. Elishama son of Ammihud was the leader of Ephraim's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were forty thousand and five hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of them, were forty thousand five hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 40,500 men.

verses.kjv: And by him shall be the tribe of Manasseh: and the captain of the children of Manasseh shall be Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
verses.web: “Next to him shall be the tribe of Manasseh. The prince of the children of Manasseh shall be Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
verses.ct: The tribe of Manasseh was to camp next to Ephraim. Gamaliel son of Pedahzur was the leader of Manasseh's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were thirty and two thousand and two hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of them, were thirty-two thousand two hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 32,200 men.

verses.kjv: Then the tribe of Benjamin: and the captain of the sons of Benjamin shall be Abidan the son of Gideoni.
verses.web: “The tribe of Benjamin: the prince of the children of Benjamin shall be Abidan the son of Gideoni.
verses.ct: Then came the tribe of Benjamin. Abidan son of Gideoni was the leader of Benjamin's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were thirty and five thousand and four hundred.
verses.web: His army, and those who were counted of them, were thirty-five thousand four hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 35,400 men.

verses.kjv: All that were numbered of the camp of Ephraim were an hundred thousand and eight thousand and an hundred, throughout their armies. And they shall go forward in the third rank.
verses.web: “All who were counted of the camp of Ephraim were one hundred eight thousand one hundred, according to their divisions. They shall set out third.
verses.ct: The total count for Ephraim's camp was 108,100 men across all their divisions. They were to march out third.

verses.kjv: The standard of the camp of Dan shall be on the north side by their armies: and the captain of the children of Dan shall be Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai.
verses.web: “On the north side shall be the standard of the camp of Dan according to their divisions. The prince of the children of Dan shall be Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai.
verses.ct: On the north side, the divisions under the banner of Dan's camp were to take their position. Ahiezer son of Ammishaddai was the leader of Dan's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were threescore and two thousand and seven hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of them, were sixty-two thousand seven hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 62,700 men.

verses.kjv: And those that encamp by him shall be the tribe of Asher: and the captain of the children of Asher shall be Pagiel the son of Ocran.
verses.web: “Those who encamp next to him shall be the tribe of Asher. The prince of the children of Asher shall be Pagiel the son of Ochran.
verses.ct: The tribe of Asher was to camp next to Dan. Pagiel son of Ocran was the leader of Asher's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were forty and one thousand and five hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of them, were forty-one thousand and five hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 41,500 men.

verses.kjv: Then the tribe of Naphtali: and the captain of the children of Naphtali shall be Ahira the son of Enan.
verses.web: “The tribe of Naphtali: the prince of the children of Naphtali shall be Ahira the son of Enan.
verses.ct: Then came the tribe of Naphtali. Ahira son of Enan was the leader of Naphtali's tribe.

verses.kjv: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
verses.web: His division, and those who were counted of them, were fifty-three thousand four hundred.
verses.ct: His division numbered 53,400 men.

verses.kjv: All they that were numbered in the camp of Dan were an hundred thousand and fifty and seven thousand and six hundred. They shall go hindmost with their standards.
verses.web: “All who were counted of the camp of Dan were one hundred fifty-seven thousand six hundred. They shall set out last by their standards.”
verses.ct: The total count for Dan's camp was 157,600 men. They were to march out last, under their own banners.

verses.kjv: These are those which were numbered of the children of Israel by the house of their fathers: all those that were numbered of the camps throughout their hosts were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty.
verses.web: These are those who were counted of the children of Israel by their fathers’ houses. All who were counted of the camps according to their armies were six hundred three thousand five hundred fifty.
verses.ct: These were the Israelites counted by their ancestral households. The grand total of all the men counted across every camp and division was 603,550.

verses.kjv: But the Levites were not numbered among the children of Israel; as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.web: But the Levites were not counted among the children of Israel, as LORD commanded Moses.
verses.ct: The Levites, however, were not included in this count along with the other Israelites, just as the LORD had commanded Moses.

verses.kjv: And the children of Israel did according to all that the LORD commanded Moses: so they pitched by their standards, and so they set forward, every one after their families, according to the house of their fathers.
verses.web: Thus the children of Israel did. According to all that LORD commanded Moses, so they encamped by their standards, and so they set out, everyone by their families, according to their fathers’ houses.
verses.ct: The Israelites did everything exactly as the LORD had commanded Moses. They camped under their tribal banners, and they marched out the same way — each man with his own family, under his father's household.
